m_szDocSumamry: The Federal Solar Tax Credit Extension: Can We Win if We Lose? September 9th, 2015 by John Farrell   Originally posted at ilsr.org . In 16 months, the solar industry faces the end of the line for the 30% federal tax credit. The Investment Tax Credit will fall to 10% for businesses and to zero for residential solar customers. Some have called this the “solar cliff.” There may be a silver lining in this tax credit expiration cloud, but it’s still a bad idea.
